overview: Collection of five short films from Falcon Studios. "Badlands" — Chores on the farm turn into hot pulsating action.  "Loft To Let" — One empty warehouse loft, three hot men, and a lot of heavy action.  "The Good Times" — Two hot, young men having fun in a plain white room.  "Fuckin' Final" (a.k.a. "Gary's First Time," "Fucking Final") — Mr. Marks agrees to help one of his freshman students with some extra tutoring. "Reflections Of Allen" — Turned on by his own reflection, a hot stud explores his body and the pleasures of solo sexual frenzy.
title: Badlands
